articles.title: Western leaders urge Russia to lower Ukraine tensions - BBC News
articles.description: The US and its European allies urge Moscow to de-escalate, amid fears it could invade Ukraine.
articles.content:
Media caption, Russian troop build-up: View from Ukraine front line
Western powers have called on Russia to lower tensions with Ukraine, and backed Kyiv against any threats from Moscow.
